Uses of Class
net.tinyos.prowler.RadioModel

  • Packages that use RadioModel 
    Package Description
    net.tinyos.prowler  

    • Uses of RadioModel in net.tinyos.prowler

      Subclasses of RadioModel in net.tinyos.prowler 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GaussianRadioModel
      This radio model uses the assumption that nodes are mainly static, they don't change their positions to often.
      class  RayleighRadioModel
      This radio model uses the assumption that nodes are moving very often.
      Methods in net.tinyos.prowler with parameters of type RadioModel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Node Simulator.createNode(java.lang.Class nodeClass, RadioModel radioModel, int nodeId, double x, double y, double z)
      Creates a node in the simulator at the given position with the given id.
      Node Simulator.createNodes(java.lang.Class nodeClass, RadioModel radioModel, int startNodeId, int nodeNum, double areaWidth, double maxElevation)
      Creates a given number of motes dispersed randomly over a given square area.
      Constructors in net.tinyos.prowler with parameters of type RadioModel 
      Constructor and Description
      Mica2Node(Simulator sim, RadioModel radioModel)
      Parameterized constructor, it set both the Simulator in which this mote exists and the RadioModel which is used by this mote.
      Node(Simulator sim, RadioModel radioModel)
      Parameterized constructor, sets the simulator and creates an initial neighborhood using the RadioModel as a factory.
      TestBroadcastNode(Simulator sim, RadioModel radioModel)
